definition: not acknowledging the God of Christianity and Judaism and Islam, a person who is a member of an ethnic group
details:
adjective
- not acknowledging the God of Christianity and Judaism and Islam
= synonyms: heathen
- denoting or deriving from or distinctive of the ways of living built up by a group of people
= example: denoting or deriving from or distinctive of the ways of living built up by a group of people
= synonyms: ethnical, cultural
noun
- a person who is a member of an ethnic group
